name: Reveal Secrets
components: V, S, M (a drop of alcoholic liquid)
text: When you cast this spell, you ask the target whether it has a secret about a specific topic that can be described in 10 words or fewer. This can concern a person, place, or thing (such as a town’s mayor, the ring worn by a traveling merchant, or the bridge spanning a nearby river) or an easily distinguished event (such as a historic battle or a recent rash of disappearances). If the target knows a secret about the topic (information it believes isn’t common knowledge and which it would not normally tell you), it states it has a secret. The target doesn’t mention anything about the secret and doesn’t remember telling you it has a secret. If the target succeeds at its saving throw, it isn’t compelled to reveal whether it knows a secret and is aware that you asked.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（一滴酒精液体）
text_zh: 当你施放这道法术时，你询问法术目标是否拥有一个有关特定主题的秘密，且该秘密可以用10个或更少的词描述。这可能会涉及到一个人、地、或物（比如一个镇的镇长、旅行商人佩戴的戒指、或跨越附近河流的桥梁），亦或是一件易辨别的事件（比如一场历史战役、或近期的一系列失踪事件）。如果目标知晓一件有关该主题的秘密（即它认为不可让大众知晓的信息，或它不能在正常情况下告知于你的信息），则它会陈述它拥有一个秘密。该目标不会提及任何有关该秘密的信息，并且不会记起它曾告知你它拥有秘密。如果目标在豁免骰中成功，它就不必透露自己是否知道一个秘密，并可知晓你的询问。
